name: Before There Were Stars
description: This is a companion app for the heart-warming board game, BEFORE THERE WERE STARS by Smirk & Laughter / Smirk & Dagger Games (required for play). The app features a one-minute timer to help each storyteller gauge the length of their mythic tales, set appropriately before a flickering bonfire, with crickets singing, as the stars and heavens move across the night sky.
